name: Discretionary Supplement
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Dori, equip this card.
After Dori equips this card, immediately use Alcazarzaray's Exactitude once.
The Jinni summoned by your Dori who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of Energy gained by characters with no Energy by 1 when Energy is gained.
(You must have Dori in your deck to add this card to your deck)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1410]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1410] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S14103]</color> once.
The <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114102]</color> summoned by your $[A1410] who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of $[K310] gained by characters with no $[K310] by 1 when $[K310] is gained.
(You must have $[A1410] in your deck to add this card to your deck)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Dori</color>, equip this card.
After Dori equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Alcazarzaray's Exactitude</color> once.
The <color=#FFFFFFFF>Jinni</color> summoned by your Dori who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color> gained by characters with no <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color> by 1 when <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color> is gained.
(You must have Dori in your deck to add this card to your deck)
storytext: "First raise the price by 30%, then sell at a 20% discount!"
source: Reward for inviting Dori to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
